lead_paragraph: Like IBM in the 1980s, the stock market giant has room to grow, but there are early signs of the end of its dominance.

headline.print_headline: Apple Won’t Always Rule. Just Look at IBM.
headline.main: Apple Won’t Always Rule. Just Look at IBM.

snippet: Like IBM in the 1980s, the stock market giant has room to grow, but there are early signs of the end of its dominance.
abstract: Jeff Sommer Strategies column examines market position of Apple, arguing that while the technology giant still has room for growth, there are several signs that its dominance may be entering period of decline; compares Apple to previous market behemoth IBM.
